title: Documentation
content: In the documentation you'll find an in depth look to every part of the IMA.js framework.

title: Tutorial
content: The tutorial, which is always good place to start, takes you through the build process of a simple guest book application.

title: Plugins
content: IMA.js comes with full support for plugins, feel free to export existing library we maintain.

title: API
content: This section provides direct look at the framework's API.
